Articles.Content:
Hello, I'm just creating this thread to reming that the retracting ladders are still bugged in .25

My KSP experience came to a point that I mostly want to build relatively big rockets, and be able to get my Kerbals in and out.

But this small bug is ruining everything for me.

Easy way to reproduce :

-Build anything with a retracting ladder on it.

-Launch it.

-Revert to Assembly building.

At this point, retracting ladders will not extend anymore.

Thanks
